subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Islanders right wing Michael Grabner, 23, cast off by Vancouver and Florida, is a candidate for N.H.L. rookie of the year with a team-high 25 goals.
snippet: Islanders right wing Michael Grabner, 23, cast off by Vancouver and Florida, is a candidate for N.H.L. rookie of the year with a team-high 25 goals.
